Class ContactInformationFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • la5.cs1120.wmich.edu.ContactInformationFormatter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IContactInformationFormatter
    public class ContactInformationFormatter
extends java.lang.Object
implements IContactInformationFormatter

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ContactInformationFormatter()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void formatContactInformation​(java.lang.String fileName)
      creates and reads a file from the input and calls methods for each line to check the formatting, will throw FileNotFoundException if the file does not exist
      void formatEmail​(java.lang.String email)
      This method takes a line from the input file and checks to see if it fits the correct email format
      void formatName​(java.lang.String name)
      This method takes a line from the input file and checks to see if it fits the correct name format
      void formatPhoneNumber​(java.lang.String phoneNumber)
      This method takes a line from the input file and checks to see if it fits the correct phone number format
      void readContactInformation​(java.lang.String[] filePaths)
      for each string in the input array will call formatContactInformation using each string as a parameter

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
